structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - USE OF SANITARY SEWER SYSTEM [4]

law.text: It shall be unlawful for any person to connect or discharge to the POTW without first obtaining the permission of the City. When requested by the POTW Director, a user must submit information on the nature and characteristics of its waste water within thirty (30) days of the request. The POTW Director is authorized to prepare a form for this purpose and may periodically require users to update this information. (Ord. No. 2011-981, ยง1, 12-6-11)
